mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEART_LIST(HEART_LIST_NO, STATUS, HEART_NO, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(HEART_LIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{status}, #{heartNo}, #{memberNo})
INSERT INTO HEART_LIST(HEART_LIST_NO, STATUS, HEART_CHARGE_NO, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(HEART_LIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{status}, #{heartChargeNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HEART_LIST HL LEFT OUTER JOIN HEART_CHARGE HC ON HL.HEART_CHARGE_NO = HC.HEART_CHARGE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN HEART H ON HL.HEART_NO = H.HEART_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE C ON H.COURSE_NO = C.COURSE_NO WHERE HL.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY HEART_LIST_NO DESC
